attributes.title: Local Teacher's Simple App Helps 50,000 Kids Learn to Read During Pandemic
attributes.description: When schools closed, elementary teacher Esperanza Cruz built a simple reading app in her spare time. Three years later, 'Read With Me' has reached children across 12 countries, with 94% of users showing measurable reading improvement within 6 months. The app uses voice recognition and gamification to make learning accessible without expensive devices.
attributes.author: Marcus Chen
